title: PICS: 5 heartmelting moments from Demi-Leigh Nel-Peters and Tim Tebow
text:
PICS: 5 heartmelting moments from Demi-Leigh Nel-Peters and Tim Tebow share this

Cape Town - Ahead of their upcoming nuptials former Miss South African Demi-Leigh Nel-Peters and her fiance Tim Tebow, prove that two is better than one!

News of the couple's relationship first came to light in mid-2018, and in January of 2019, the American sports star got down on one knee and asked Demi-Leigh to be his wife.

From practising their first dance to coming up with a hashtag for their big day, Demi-Leigh and her husband-to-be continue to tick items off their wedding checklist.

The pair have been documented the wedding planning experience on Instagram, resulting in several adorable ooey gooey couple moments!

Speaking to Channel24, Demi-Leigh admitted that they didn't initially spend a lot of time together at the start of their relationship, because of conflicting schedules. But the pair are certainly making up for lost time!

TAKE A LOOK AT 5 HEARTWARMING MOMENTS HERE:
